text: Sitabinji railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Sitabinji village. Its code is STBJ. It has two platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Sitabinji railway station. ==Major Trains== * Puri - Barbil Express * Kendujhar(KDJR) to bhubaneswar(BBS) first passenger / train number 58425 * Bhubaneswar (BBS) to kendujhar (KDJR) first passenger / train number 58426 ==See also== * Kendujhar district Kendujhar(KDJR) to bhubaneswar(BBS) first passenger ==References== Category:Railway stations in Kendujhar district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Sitabinji railway station
